DDMLiterals.CustomCycle.Label: CUSTOM CYCLES
DDMLiterals.DishCavity.Label: Dishwasher
DDMLiterals.Cavity_CycleSetDownloadAndGoDownloadGoGe: Limits cycle temperatures to 135F to help protect items prone to melting with varying soil levels.  If selected, Heat Dry is also shortened to limit heat input.
DDMLiterals.Cavity_CycleSetDownloadAndGoDownloadGoHe: Provides extra wash time and heat to clean tougher items with baked-on food residue.
DDMLiterals.Cavity_CycleSetDownloadAndGoDownloadGoQu: Quick cleaning power. Perfect for cleaning food prep items (such as mixing bowls) and getting everything ready for an event.
DDMLiterals.Cavity_CycleSetDownloadAndGoDownloadGoSa: Uses extra wash time and high temperatures (156F) to ensure important items come out clean
DDMLiterals.Cavity_CycleSetDownloadAndGoDownloadGoSp: Senses the amount of wash time and heat needed to clean food residue. Great for items that may need a little more care.
DDMLiterals.Cavity_CycleSetOptionUpperRackOnly.Descr: Washes dishes on the top rack only. Can be used with any wash cycle.
DDMLiterals.Cavity_CycleSetOptionLowerRackOnly.Descr: Washes dishes on the bottom rack only. Can be used with any wash cycle.
DDMLiterals.Cavity_CycleSetOptionSaniRinse.Descripti: The final rinse water is heated to 155°F (68.3°C), eliminating 99.999% of food soil bacteria
DDMLiterals.Cavity_CycleSetOptionSmartHeatedDry.Desc: Active drying that evenly dries with heat and a fan.
DDMLiterals.Cavity_CycleSetOptionBottleWashZone.Desc: Articulating nozzles deliver a high-powered spray into tall items, including vases and champagne flutes.
DDMLiterals.Cavity_CycleSetOptionSteam.Description: Helps your stemware glisten by generating a cloud of steam before the final rinse cycle.
DDMLiterals.Cavity_CycleSetOptionHighTemp.Descriptio: Provides increased water temperature during washing for hard-to-remove soils.
DDMLiterals.ControlLock.Label: Control lock
DDMLiterals.ControlLock.Description: Lock the controls to prevent unintended use of the appliance
DDMLiterals.Notifications.Label: Notifications
DDMLiterals.Notifications.Description: Start or stop notifications for individual notifications at any time
DDMLiterals.SabbathMode.Label: Sabbath mode
DDMLiterals.SabbathMode.Description: Set your dishwasher to act in accordance with religious guidelines for use during the Sabbath
DDMLiterals.QuietMode.Label: Quiet mode
DDMLiterals.QuietMode.Description: Silences all tones and audio of your dishwasher

F1,E2.Name: General Fault
F1,E2.Description: The dishwasher has experienced an error that will require service to troubleshoot and repair as necessary.

F2,E2.Name: General Fault
F2,E2.Description: The dishwasher has experienced an error that will require a reset
StepsToRepair: Turn off power to the dishwasher by turning off the circuit breaker for one (1) minute.
Turn on power to the dishwasher by turning on the circuit breaker.
Monitor the dishwasher for one (1) minute to ensure the error code does not display again.

F2,E3.Name: General Fault
F2,E3.Description: The dishwasher has experienced an error that will require service to troubleshoot and repair as necessary.

NestSettings.QuietWhileHome.Name: Quiet While Home
NestSettings.QuietWhileHome.Description: Your dishwasher will automatically go into Quiet Mode when Nest™ knows you’re home.
NestSettings.WashWhileAway.Name: Wash While Away
NestSettings.WashWhileAway.Description: When Nest™ detects you're away, your dishwasher will start the selected cycle.  Please note that it may take up to two hours for Nest™ to send the away signal.

CycleComplete.Name: Cycle Complete
CycleComplete.Description: Receive a notification when the selected wash cycle has successfully completed.

FilterStatus.Name: Clean Filter Alert
FilterStatus.Description: Receive a notification when it’s time to clean your dishwasher's triple filtration system.

SaniRinse.Name: Sanitize Rinse
SaniRinse.Description: Receive notification for Sanitize Rinse Temperature.

RemoteStatus.Name: Remote Control Status
RemoteStatus.Description: Receive a notification when your appliance's Remote Enabled status has changed.

AffreshNotification.Name: affresh® Status
AffreshNotification.Description: Receive a notification when it’s time to run an affresh® cleaning cycle to keep your dishwasher clean

AffreshDishwasherCleaner.Name: affresh® Dishwasher Cleaner
AffreshDishwasherCleaner.Description: Power away - the right way affresh® Dishwasher Clearn is specially formulated to help remove limescale and mineral build-up that can be unsightly and could affect your dishwasher's performance. Each tablet is designed to clean inside your machine while your detergent cleans your dishes.*
AffreshDishwasherCleaner.Disclaimer: check manufacturer's suggest cleaning instructions on all dishwasher-save items.

NotificationContents.SmsText: It's time to run an affresh® cleaning cycle on your dishwasher. It is recommended that you use affresh every month to keep your dishwasher clean and fresh.
NotificationContents.EmailText: It's time to run an affresh® cleaning cycle on your dishwasher. It is recommended that you use affresh every month to keep your dishwasher clean and fresh.
NotificationContents.PushText: It's time to run an affresh® cleaning cycle on your dishwasher. It is recommended that you use affresh every month to keep your dishwasher clean and fresh.

NotificationContents.SmsText: It's time to clean your dishwasher's triple filtration system in order to achieve optimal cleaning performance.
NotificationContents.EmailText: It's time to clean your dishwasher's triple filtration system in order to achieve optimal cleaning performance.
NotificationContents.PushText: It's time to clean your dishwasher's triple filtration system in order to achieve optimal cleaning performance.

NotificationContents.SmsText: Dishwasher Remote control is enabled. You can now control your dishwasher remotely.
NotificationContents.EmailText: Dishwasher Remote control is enabled. You can now control your dishwasher remotely.
NotificationContents.PushText: Dishwasher Remote control is enabled. You can now control your dishwasher remotely.

NotificationContents.SmsText: Dishwasher Remote control on is disabled. You can re-enable on the appliance if you would like to control your appliance remotely.
NotificationContents.EmailText: Dishwasher Remote control on is disabled. You can re-enable on the appliance if you would like to control your appliance remotely.
NotificationContents.PushText: Dishwasher Remote control on is disabled. You can re-enable on the appliance if you would like to control your appliance remotely.
